text:
Hi!
Is it possible to fetch data from an third-party api server side using HubSpot/hubl or is javascript the only way? :)
No. you can't do it with the HubL But You can do with the JS and GraphQL.

<#C2YH119N2|hubl> Hey there everyone -
Is there anyway of using Query Params inside Quote Modules from here ??
{{ line_items_table_rows(LINE_ITEMS, "&name==Customer Support") }}
<@U01F0D3NY05> Not with hubl but only with JS - request/node, or axios

Hey! Anyone out there have a good solution for making the related_blog_posts pull in the most recent related blog posts? I know you can select a start date, but that is not quite what I am looking for.

hi there - I don’t know of a way to accomplish using that specific tag. But if you haven’t already, taking a look at the the blog_recent_tag_posts function, or one of its siblings, might get ya what you’re looking for: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#blog-recent-tag-posts>
